location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:820 x 503 mm, on sheet 580 x 543 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Photostat copy based on a map of Asia drawn to scale 1:1,000,000 issued by the War Office with adjustments controlled by traverses made during a survey carried out in February 1933 for the Iraq Petroleum Co. Ltd.Shows roads and wells with boundary indicated by dash-dot line.Inscriptions:On recto in the upper centre above title, in blue crayon: ‘A.P.O.C.’.
